news.title: JPMorgan Chase is heading upmarket to woo America’s millionaires
news.summary: The new locations, dubbed J.P. Morgan Financial Centers, have a feel and earth-tone color palette that sets them apart from the nearly 5,000 Chase branches.

news.title: Salesforce to acquire data management company Informatica in $8 billion deal
news.summary: Salesforce is buying cloud data management firm Informatica. The move will bolster the enterprise software giant's push into artificial intelligence. The deal is expected to close in the next few months.

news.title: NPR sues Trump over executive order cutting federal funding
news.summary: National Public Radio sued President Donald Trump over his executive order to cease all federal funding for the broadcaster. National Public Radio is a public radio station based in New York.

news.title: Southwest Airlines will start charging $35 for a checked bag tomorrow
news.summary: Southwest will start selling basic economy tickets on May 28. The airline will also start charging for checked bags for the first time in its history.

news.title: Trump administration moves to cut rest of Harvard contracts with federal government
news.summary: President Donald Trump suggested taking $3 billion in frozen grant money to Harvard and and give it to trade schools. President Donald Trump in a social media post suggested.

news.title: Why wealth rarely survives grandchildren — and how your family can beat the odds
news.summary: The ‘Vanderbilt curse’ — making and losing a fortune in just three generations. 6 keys to avoiding the ‘Curse’ are among the top 10 things you need to do to avoid it.

news.title: Why Obama’s former budget director is now sounding alarms about debt
news.summary: The time to worry about the U.S. budget deficit is now, says Obama’s former budget chief Peter Orszag.

news.title: Retail investors aren’t scared of the stock market. That will only make the selloff worse.
news.summary: Regular investors have been “buying the dip’ aggressively. Remember: “Be fearful when others are greedy.’”

news.title: After 25 years, I finally asked for separate checks — and my friends iced me out. Did I do something terrible?
news.summary: “With each year I got angrier and angrier, so it was time to move on,” he said. “With every year I became more and more angry.”

news.title: Business investment posts biggest drop in 6 months. Trade wars still disrupting economy.
news.summary: A key measure of business investment posted the biggest decline in six months in April. Companies froze spending to try to navigate on-again, off-again tariffs.
